name: The Great Machine - LDJam48
description:
Explore the Depths inside The Great Machine

Ride The Great Machine down into the depths in search of Treasure! Spend your hard-earned gold on oxygen upgrades to explore for greater lengths of time, or stop by the medical machine to heal up. Be careful, not everything in the depths is friendly!

  Controls

- WASD - Movement

- E - Interact

- Left Click / Shift - Attack

- Q - Throw Pickaxe

*This Game was Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 48*
